channel.title: Grand Exchange Command

item.title: Grand Exchange Command
item.dc:creator: @EclipsedSkapez EclipsedSkapez
item.description:
@EclipsedSkapez wrote:

heres my shops.cfg basicly I added this command then at the bottom I added Grand exchange shop 44 can someone help I dont know
how to fix!

command is:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“exchange”)){
openUpShop(ReplaceThisWithYourShopID);
}

shops.cfg has this at the bottom for the shop:

shop = 44 Grand_Exchange 2 2

now this all works completely the command opens the shop but I cant sale anything to the shop…

Read full topic
